snippet.title: PES 2013 Trailer (E3 2012)
snippet.description:
PES 2013 Trailer (E3 2012). Endorsed by Cristiano Ronaldo, PES returns with the individual skills of the world's best footballers and the total freedom, for the player, to play any style of ball he wants ! Join us on Facebook : http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial ! 

PES 2013 Trailer (E3 2012). The game will be soon available on PS3, Xbox 360, PC, Wii, 3DS and PSP. Suscribe now to get the forthcoming gameplay trailers and videos !
